alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 1:56PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Newton, southern Porter, southeastern Lake and northern Jasper Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shelby to near DeMotte to near Roselawn. The strongest thunderstorm was just southwest of Roselawn as of 1256 PM. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valparaiso, DeMotte, Hebron, Wheatfield, Lake Village, Roselawn, Kouts, Shelby, Schneider, Boone Grove, Thayer, Sumava Resorts, Stoutsburg, Fair Oaks, Dunns Bridge and Malden. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 224 and 239. This includes... Porter County Fairgrounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
